{{also|eür}} ==English== ===Adverb=== {{head|en|adverb}} # {{obsolete typography of|en|ever}} ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=eeru|Eure}} ---- ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|ewer}} {{qual|obsolete}} * {{l|de|eurer}} {{qual|for the pronoun, proscribed}} ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|iuwar}}, from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*izweraz}}. Compare {{cog|en|your}}, {{cog|nl|jouw}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈɔʏ̯ɐ/}} * {{audio|de|De-euer.ogg|audio}} * {{rhymes|de|ɔɪ̯ɐ}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|de|pronoun form|cat2=personal pronouns}} # {{lb|de|personal}} {{inflection of|de|ihr||gen|s}}. #: {{ux|de|Die Macht ist '''euer'''!|The power is '''yours'''.}} #* Leonid Andrejew, Otto Buek, ''Judas Ischariot und die andern'', page 82: #*: Höre! '''Euer''' sind hier viele. ====Usage notes==== See usage notes on {{m|de|ihr}}. ===Determiner=== {{head|de|determiner|cat2=possessive determiners}} # [[your]] {{qualifier|addressing two or more people informally}} #: {{ux|de|'''Eure''' Zeit ist um.|'''Your''' time is up.}} ====Inflection==== {{de-decl-euer}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Ew.}} * {{l|de|euresgleichen}}, {{l|de|euersgleichen}} * {{l|de|euerthalben}} * {{l|de|euretwegen}}
